name: rss grabber
author: naimgr83

sections.description:
RSS GRABBER is plugin for importing, and displaying RSS feeds.With RSS GRABBER you can download the contents with video and pictures. Videos and pictures in , and tags can be downloaded.mp4 and jpeg formats are supported.If a piece of content has multiple images, they can also be downloaded optionally.
If you download all images of content containing multiple images, only 1 of them will appear on the page.To access other images of this content Edit Post->Add media->Filter media->Uploaded to this post options need to be selected.If Download video is selected, the video is downloaded and embedded in the content.For videos or images to be downloaded by the plugin, and tags must not be together in the same RSS feeds.
sections.installation: Upload the rss grabber plugin to your blog and activate

If you download all images of content containing multiple images, only 1 of them will appear on the page.To access other images of this content Edit Post->Add media->Filter media->Uploaded to this post options need to be selected.If Download video is selected, the video is downloaded and embedded in the content.For videos or images to be downloaded by the plugin, and tags must not be together in the same RSS feeds.
